rows.label: qev012401_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah! Finally![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Hmm... Keen eyes... Agile body...
The very picture of a well-honed BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Seems luck is with me! The circumstances
were less than favorable, and yet they've
brought me a singular talent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_JNK0010
rows.name: Reel

rows.label: qev012401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Roscoe what he's talking about.

rows.label: qev012401_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev012401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Roscoe if he posted a mission.

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0004
rows.name:
Hmm? Didn't you come here because
of my Mission Control posting?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, no matter. I'm certainly not passing up
an opportunity like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0006
rows.name: I would ask for a moment of your time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0007
rows.name:
Indeed! I was told it would take time to be listed,
and that finding a suitable respondent could be
longer still. And yet, here you stand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0008
rows.name:
In any case, none of that matters now.
I'll begin briefing you immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0009
rows.name: My name is Roscoe, and I am a Curator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0010
rows.name:
I typically fill orders from the Grenada Galactic Group
for miranium and the like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0011
rows.name:
A few days ago, we lost the signal of a freight
helicopter near the Sunlit Spring in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Unfortunately, we've also lost contact with
both members of the crew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0013
rows.name: We need to mount a rescue effort as soon as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_JNK0030
rows.name: Despair

rows.label: qev012401_SEL0031
rows.name:
Tell Roscoe they've probably
already been eaten by indigens.

rows.label: qev012401_JNK0040
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev012401_SEL0041
rows.name: Suggest Roscoe go rescue them himself.

rows.label: qev012401_JNK0050
rows.name: Probe

rows.label: qev012401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Roscoe how this all happened.

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0014
rows.name:
Bite your tongue! I'm no fool—I know that's
almost certainly the case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0015
rows.name: But if I don't keep hope alive, who will?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0016
rows.name: I know the limits of my ability.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0017
rows.name:
A one-man expedition into Noctilum would lead me
right into the belly of some creature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0018
rows.name: Besides, the helicopter may be damaged.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0019
rows.name:
The job calls for a helicopter mechanic who is also
a combat expert and who will ideally perform both
roles on the cheap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0020
rows.name:
The cause? Impossible to say, I'm afraid.
Mira is a font of inexplicable occurrences.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0021
rows.name:
One thing I can say with certainty, though,
is that Howard and Ciska despise one another.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0022
rows.name:
Perhaps their fighting escalated to heavy
artillery. Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0023
rows.name:
It's funny because it's quite possible, you see!
Yes, well. You seem unamused. Moving along.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0024
rows.name:
I ask that you travel to Noctilum and extract
Howard and Ciska as soon as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0025
rows.name: Thank you. I await word of your success.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0026
rows.name:
I hope you can see them both safely
back home to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0027
rows.name:
We lost contact with the freight heli near the
Sunlit Spring in Noctilum. Be careful out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0028
rows.name:
If the heli's been damaged, I ask that you
assist in its repair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0029
rows.name:
But if this was an elaborate elopement or the like,
punch them both in the head and drag them back
home, if you'd be so kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0030
rows.name:
Oh, and if they were eaten by indigenous creatures,
I encourage you to run.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0031
rows.name: Howard and Ciska were alive? Excellent news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0032
rows.name: But your job was to bring them home to NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0033
rows.name:
I would ask you to assist them in repairing
the helicopter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0034
rows.name: I've been waiting for you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0035
rows.name: Both Howard and Ciska made it back safely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0036
rows.name:
And with cargo intact, no less. We made our
delivery to Grenada GG with time to spare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0037
rows.name: I can't begin to thank you enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0038
rows.name:
Ah, but forgive me. You'll be wanting thanks
of a more practical nature, I expect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0039
rows.name:
Despite the ordeal, Howard and Ciska are still
at each other's throats. I've no doubt they'll
cause more trouble in the future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0040
rows.name: I'll keep your contact information handy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0041
rows.name:
Ah, it's you. Thank you for your work.
Ciska made it home safely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012402_JNK0060
rows.name: Urge

rows.label: qev012402_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Roscoe for your payment.

rows.label: qev012402_JNK0070
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev012402_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Roscoe about Howard.

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0042
rows.name: Quite the professional, I see. All business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0043
rows.name:
However—and I'm not suggesting you're to blame—
you should know that Howard is dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0044
rows.name: Howard is dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0045
rows.name:
Ciska piloted the helicopter safely back as far as
New LA's west gate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0046
rows.name:
But the vehicle then ceased to respond and ultimately
crashed. The result of a hasty patch job, perhaps...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0047
rows.name:
Regardless, Ciska managed to escape with her life,
but Howard was less fortunate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0048
rows.name:
We lost a good man—not to mention a helicopter
and all its cargo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0049
rows.name:
Poor Ciska is still in shock.
I doubt she'll work on this team again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0050
rows.name: As for what's to come, I simply don't know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0051
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0052
rows.name: Pardon me. You still need to be paid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0053
rows.name:
I've increased the amount from the sum
we agreed upon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0054
rows.name:
If your schedule permits, I would ask that you
speak to Ciska.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0055
rows.name: I fear I lack the words to rouse her from her malaise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012401_MSG0056
rows.name: But you, perhaps, may stand a better chance.[ST:wait ]
